prompts: I want a calm and comfortable area for napping.
I'd like a room where I can relax and have fun.
Something small and not too large, but comfortable.
I would like a place I can rest all day.
I want a hybrid between a bedroom and living room
A small yet modern and colorful space.
I want a spacious room to express myself.
I'd like to be in a small and personalized room.
A contemporary design where I can cutomize to my liking.
I want the living room to be the center of a modern design.
A modern design with a contrasting color palette.
I'd like to have a small but functional cooking area.
I want something humble, calm, and white.
Simple but modern and works well in an apartment.
Something simple and compact, but highly functional.
